anpl:
def main(input_grid: np.ndarray) -> np.ndarray:
    out1 = "find all not black pixels at the corner, if any neighbor of the pixel is black, turn it to black. return the grid"(input_grid)
    out2 = "find all not black pixels in the edge line, if at least 2 of 4 neighbors of the pixel is black, turn it to black. return the grid"(out1)
    out = "find all not black pixels not in edge line or at the corner, if at least 3 of 4 neighbors of the pixel is black, turn it to black. return the grid"(out2)
    return out
